articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.title: Android is getting an AI-powered scam call detection feature - The Verge
articles.description: Google is testing a new call monitoring feature that warns users if the person they’re talking to is likely attempting to scam them and encourages them to end such calls.
articles.content:
Android is getting an AI-powered scam call detection feature

 / Google says the new protections utilize Gemini Nano and that itll share … [+2169 chars]
